about_the_game:
Season 3.5" is the story between "Burrows editions" and "Jillian editions".

Noel the Mortal Fate" is an adventure game in which Noel, a girl who has lost her physical freedom, and Caron, a demon, team up to take revenge.
Players control Noel, Caron, and their friends as they explore maps, battle hostile characters, and complete other action-packed missions to advance the story.

Season 3.5" begins when Noel is given a seven-day vacation by Caron!

1) Work part-time, visit cat cafes, and freely explore the slums


2) Challenge the action-packed alleyway missions


3）Conversation with residents and search for the owner of the safe house


That familiar character, and even a new enemy!
You will definitely be able to play the game again and again, as your choices change with your conversations and actions with the slum dwellers!

Story
Noel is exhausted from the battle in the old Capitol, and Caron proposes a seven-day vacation.
While puzzled by his unfamiliarity with the vacation, Noel becomes curious about the owner of the "safe house" and begins to investigate.
He finds electricity, running water, and a piano still in use.
Noel and Caron wander around the slum, gathering information from residents and chasing the owner's shadow.
Will they find the owner?
And where has that person disappeared to?
